title: foia_lieberman
abstract:
May 21, 2009
The Honorable Joseph I. Lieberman, Chairman
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
United States Senate
Washington, DC 20510-6250
Dear Chairman Lieberman:
I am writing to request your assistance in obtaining information from the Legislative 
Branch of the United States Government about the true cost of accessing primary legal 
information.  First, however, I must thank you for your letter of February 27, 2009 to 
the Judicial Conference on the issues of privacy and
